products.short_description: Provision a secure, scalable AI deployment with supporting IBM Cloud and watsonx services to embed enterprise knowledge into generative AI workflows.
products.long_description:
Utilize data from your enterprise to achieve productivity gains in activities related to question/answer conversations, content search, summarization and generation. Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) based solutions can be deployed in multiple configurations and is applicable to various industry use cases.

This deployable architecture provides a quick provisioning of AI services on IBM Cloud which can be leveraged to deploy [RAG](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/pattern-genai-rag?topic=pattern-genai-rag-genai-pattern) based AI applications. 

Key capabilities include:
- Deploying a suite of watsonx services to provide generative AI RAG capabilities
- Deploying the databases for Elasticsearch for storing vector embeddings of the documents and content search/retrieval
- Provision Code Engine for deployment of generative AI applications on IBM Cloud.

The configurations are flexible and be changed to meet the needs for several types of RAG patterns depending on the chosen combination of technologies and services.

The generative AI RAG pattern services include:
- [watsonx.ai](https://dataplatform.cloud.ibm.com/docs/content/wsj/getting-started/welcome-main.html?context=wx)
- [watsonx Assistant](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/watson-assistant?topic=watson-assistant-welcome-new-assistant)
- [Watson Discovery](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/discovery-data)
- [Elasticsearch](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/databases-for-elasticsearch) Enterprise and Platinum edition

The supporting services include:
- [Secrets Manager](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/secrets-manager)
- [Key Protect](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/key-protect)
- [Object Storage](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/cloud-object-storage?topic=cloud-object-storage-getting-started-cloud-object-storage)

By leveraging this architecture, you can accelerate your deployment and tailor it to meet your unique business needs and enterprise goals.

features.description: Ideal for users new to IBM Cloud or watsonx.ai who want to get started without configuring underlying infrastructure.

Quickly provisions watsonx.ai, watsonx Assistant, watson Discovery, watsonx.data, watsonx.governance, Elasticsearch, Object Storage, Key Management Services and Code Engine. Includes all necessary services to deploy a sample Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application leveraging Code Engine.

diagram.caption: Landing zone for cloud-native AI applications - QuickStart

diagrams.description: This deployable architecture provisions a suite of AI and data services on IBM Cloud to support rapid development and deployment of Landing zone for cloud-native AI applications. It includes watsonx.ai for foundation model training and inference, watsonx Assistant for conversational AI, watson Discovery for intelligent document understanding, watsonx.data to support enterprise-grade requirements by using additional services, watsonx.governance to analyze your AI with trust and transparency and IBM Cloud Databases for Elasticsearch. The solution also provisions IBM Cloud Object Storage (COS) for persistent storage of model artifacts, application data, and logs, and Key Management Services (KMS) to ensure secure handling of sensitive information and encryption keys across services. Once the foundational services are provisioned, a sample Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application can be deployed to demonstrate how enterprise-grade AI solutions can be built using IBM Cloud-native services. The application leverages `watsonx.ai` for generative responses, Elasticsearch for document retrieval, and Code Engine to orchestrate the runtime environment.
